sentences.sContent: The election of Mary Robinson in 1990 was a watershed in Irish politics.
sentences.sCn: 1990年玛丽·鲁滨逊的当选是爱尔兰政治的分水岭。

synos.tran: （美）[水文]流域；[地理]分水岭；集水区；转折点

phrases.pCn: 分水岭地区；分水界域；集水面积

trans.tranOther: the time in the evening after which television programmes that are not considered suitable for children may be shown in Britain
